{{sld|King Thor Vol 1 4}}(Full appearance) | HistoryText = During the 11th century, [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor Odinson]] - carrying on [[Avengers (1,000,000 BC) (Earth-616)|the tradition of his father]] - assembled and led a team of mystical and supernaturally-empowered beings that included [[Nehanda (Earth-616)|Nehanda]] the [[Black Panther]], [[Ghost Rider (1,000 AD) (Earth-616)|a Native American Ghost Rider]], [[Bodolf (Earth-616)|Bodolf the Black]], [[Iron Fist (Atlantean) (Earth-616)|an Atlantean princess]] bearing the [[Iron Fist]], [[Phoenix (1,000 AD) (Earth-616)|an elderly woman]] indwelled by the [[Phoenix Force (Earth-616)|Phoenix Force]], and [[Tanaraq (Earth-616)|Tanaraq]] of the [[Great Beasts (Earth-616)|Great Beasts]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 7}}{{r|King Thor Vol 1 4}} The team battled threats to humanity such as the devil [[Mephisto (Earth-616)|Mephisto]] and the [[Homo superior|mutant]] warlord [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]],{{r|Avengers Vol 8 38}} but ultimately disbanded - with some members perishing and others returning to their homelands. | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
